Address.title: The Address schema
Address.description: The provided structured address for a given party

Carrier.title: The Carrier schema
Carrier.description: The Ocean Carrier for use when containerised freight is moving by sea

organizationId.title: A coded Identifier for Ocean Carriers
organizationId.description: Ocean Carriers use an identifying code known as SCAC

name.title: The Name of the Carrier
name.description: The Name of the carrier in freetext

Consignee.title: The Consignee schema

organizationId.title: A coded identifier for the Consignee
organizationId.description: A coded value for the Consignee, for UK and Europe this should be the EORI if available or if not mutually agreed with Traqa.

name.title: Consignee Name
name.description: Free Text Name of the Consignee

Consignee.description: The Consignee is the person who will be receiving the consignment (material) they may not necessarily be the physical destination

personName.title: Person Name
personName.description: The name, expressed as text, of this trade contact person.

telephone.title: Telephone
telephone.description: Telephone communication information for this trade contact.

emailAddress.title: Email Address
emailAddress.description: The email address for this trade contact.

borderTransportMeans.description: Enter the mode of transport corresponding to the active means of transport which it is expected will be used on exit from the customs territory of the Union. DE 7/4 CDS

modeCode.description:
Mode of Transport at the Border as described in DE 7/4 you should indicate the active mode of transport expected when leaving the customs territory.  
 * 1 = Sea/Maritime 
 * 6 = RoRo

identity.description: If moving by modeCode = 1 (sea) enter the name of the vessel OR its IMO to identify the vessel the containers are being loaded onto.  If moving by Road (modeCode = 6) the vehicle registration is automatically populated so can be omitted

container.description:
Enter the appropriate Union code to indicate if the goods will be in a shipping container when crossing the external border of the Union. DE 7/2 for CDS.  
 * 0 for goods not in containers 
 * 1 for goods in container

customsOfficeExit.description: Using the relevant Union code, enter the customs office by which it is intended that the goods should leave the customs territory.  DE 5/4 CDS

exportClearance.description: Indicate if Traqa should submit the Export Customs Clearance Declaration on your behalf to Authorities, if not the commercial invoice will be created and no declaration made.

goodsLocation.description: Using the relevant codes, enter the location where the goods are located at the time they are declared and available for examination purposes.  The Goods Location Code must be precise enough to allow Customs to carry out physical controls on the goods. DE 5/23 CDS, note use of CDS codes over CHIEF Codes as they are different.  https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/uk-trade-tariff-cds-volume-3-export-declaration-completion-guide/group-5-dates-times-periods-places-countries-and-regions#de-523-location-of-goods-box-30-location-of-goods

invoiceAmount.description: Value of the invoice in the currency declared in invoiceCurrency

invoiceCurrency.description: Currency code as defined by ISO 4217

procedure.description: Enter the appropriate (4-digit) Procedure Code from those detailed in Appendix 1: DE 1/10: Requested and Previous Procedure Codes. NOTE: Traqa only supports one procedure per load due to the nature of the process, this will apply to all items in the customs declaration.

LoadingSite.title: The loadingSite schema

organizationId.title: Loading Site Code
organizationId.description: A registered BIC Facility Code to identify the facility the material is being loaded at

LoadingSite.description: The Loading Site of the Material which will provide weights to Traqa.

Loadplan.title: The Load Plan Schema

carriersReferenceNumber.title: The carriersReferenceNumber schema
carriersReferenceNumber.description: The Ocean Carrier Booking Number used for tracking containers

shippersIdentifyingNumberForShipment.title: The shippersIdentifyingNumberForShipment schema
shippersIdentifyingNumberForShipment.description: A purchase order number for the shipment, could be from shipper or consignee

pickupReferenceNumber.title: The pickupReferenceNumber schema
pickupReferenceNumber.description: The loading reference the driver will provide to site on arrival, must be unique per load.

transportEquipment.title: The transportEquipment schema
transportEquipment.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

portOfDischarge.title: The portOfDischarge schema

UNLocode.title: The UNLocode schema
UNLocode.description: A coded reference to the location provided by the UN

portOfDischarge.description: A coded reference to the location for the port of discharge, used in transport provided by the UN

dates.title: The Datetimes related to the Loadplan

scheduledLoadingTransportEvent.title: The scheduledLoadingTransportEvent
scheduledLoadingTransportEvent.description: The planned date time of the loading at site.

customsDeclaration.description: Value should be true if user wants Traqa undertake the customs process

tradeItem.title: The tradeItem schema

statisticalValue.title: The description schema
statisticalValue.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

harmonizeSystemCode.title: The harmonizeSystemCode schema
harmonizeSystemCode.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

description.title: The description schema
description.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

tradeItem.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

portOfLoading.title: The portOfLoading schema

UNLocode.title: The UNLocode schema
UNLocode.description: A coded reference to the location provided by the UN

portOfLoading.description: A coded reference to the location for the port of loading, used in transport provided by the UN

Loadplan.description: The Load Plan schema provided by the shipper to initiate the Traqa process

PERN.title: Packaging Export Recovery Note (PERN)
PERN.description: Information about a PERN thats required to appear on the Annex VII

pernIssued.title: PERN Issued
pernIssued.description: Indicates if a PERN is issued for this shipment

percentage.title: Percentage of MT
percentage.description: Percentage of MT to be issued for PERN

RecoveryFacility.title: The Recovery Facility schema

organizationId.title: A coded identifier for the Recovery Facility
organizationId.description: A coded value for the Recovery Facility, for UK and Europe this should be the EORI if available or if not mutually agreed with Traqa.

name.title: Recovery Facility Name
name.description: Free Text Name of the Recovery Facility

RecoveryFacility.description: The Recovery Facility should be provided when different to Box 2 (Consignee) if not provided it will default to Consignee.

Shipper.title: The Shipper schema
Shipper.description: The Shipper is the party who is exporting, and is the commercial contact for the loading site.

organizationId.title: A coded Identifer for the Shipper
organizationId.description: The shipper Organisation Id is usually an EORI number assigned by a government, it can in place of this be a Traqa specific reference.

Weights.title: The Complete Weight Schema

references.title: The references schema

despatchNoteNumber.title: The despatchNoteNumber schema
despatchNoteNumber.description: The weighbridge ticket number from the loading site.

shippersIdentifyingNumberForShipment.title: The shippersIdentifyingNumberForShipment schema
shippersIdentifyingNumberForShipment.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

vehicleIdentificationNumber.title: The vehicleIdentificationNumber schema
vehicleIdentificationNumber.description: The registration number of the vehicle

pickupReferenceNumber.title: The pickupReferenceNumber schema
pickupReferenceNumber.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

references.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

verifiedWeight.title: The verifiedWeight schema

weightVerificationMethod.title: The weightVerificationMethod schema
weightVerificationMethod.description: SOLAS VGM provides 2 methods, for all that are weighed at a weighbridge use method 1.

weighingDate.title: The weighingDate schema
weighingDate.description: Date of the weighing of container

value.title: The value schema
value.description: The weight of the laden container including the tare weight of a container if appropriate

verifiedWeight.description: For container movements this container the Verified Gross Mass or VGM thats mandatory to enter a port for safety.

equipmentTareWeight.title: The equipmentTareWeight schema

value.title: The value schema
value.description: The Tare weight of a container (empty weight)

equipmentTareWeight.description: The tare weight is required for containerised movements to calculate the VGM.

seal.title: The seal schema
seal.description: The seal numbers used to seal the container or trailer

anyOf.title: Seal Number

identifier.title: The identifier schema
identifier.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

anyOf.description: The seal number used on the transport equipment

equipmentNumber.title: The equipmentNumber schema
equipmentNumber.description: The Container Number OR the Trailer number that the goods have been loaded onto

haulier.title: The haulier schema

organizationId.title: A coded Identifier for the haulier who arrives at site
organizationId.description: The haulier identifier is the waste carrier license number, mandated by the EA.

haulier.description: The Haulier who arrives at site to trasport the goods.

dates.title: The dates schema

actualDepartureTransportEvent.title: The actualDepartureTransportEvent schema
actualDepartureTransportEvent.description: The Actual Departure of the laden vehicle from Loading Site from final weigh

actualArrivalTransportEvent.title: The actualArrivalTransportEvent schema
actualArrivalTransportEvent.description: The Actual Arrival of the empty vehicle at Loading Site for the first weigh

dates.description: Dates relevant to the movement of material.

grossWeight.title: The grossWeight schema

value.title: The value schema
value.description: The weight of the material without any equipment (Product Weight)

grossWeight.description: Weight of the Product loaded for movement

harmonizeSystemCode.title: The harmonizeSystemCode schema
harmonizeSystemCode.description: The Harmonised Commodity Code of the material for Customs reporting purposes

description.title: The description schema
description.description: The Name of material that is loaded.

Weights.description: The Weight payload for a Loading Site to complete the weighing of planned Traqa loads.
